articles.title: National Meeting Marks KPA's 80th Anniversary
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks KPA's 80th Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place with splendor at the April 25 House of Culture here on Wednesday to celebrate the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA, was present at the meeting.
					
					 Attending the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and families of servicemen, working people and overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of different countries, members of military attaches corps and foreign guests were present there on invitation.
					
					 KPA Vice-Marshal Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, made a report.
					
					 First he warmly congratulated the service persons of the KPA and the KPISF and members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards who have reliably backed the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms and paid respect to the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners and KPA martyrs who laid down their lives for the freedom and independence of the country and the liberation of the people.
					
					 He said President Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on Apr. 25, 1932 and achieved the historic cause of national liberation after defeating the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					 The President developed the KPA into regular revolutionary armed forces and built self-supporting national defence industry despite the difficult and complicated situation after the country's liberation. His outstanding Songun leadership provided a powerful military guarantee for stepping up the building of a new country, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 The historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was one of the President's Juche-oriented military idea and iron will and prominent commanding art. It was a military miracle in the 20th century that the DPRK shattered the myth of "mightiness" of U.S. imperialism in the world eyes.
					
					 The President's guidance over the People's Army enabled it to invariably preserve its character as the revolutionary armed forces of the party that inherited the tradition of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He also advanced the military line of self-defence and the slogan "A-match-for-a hundred" so as to bolster the defence capability of the country in every aspect.
					
					 The cause of Juche-based army-building pioneered and led by the President was creditably carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism in the 1990s and put forward the People's Army as the driving force of the revolution on the principle of putting the army ahead of the working class.
					
					 Thanks to his experienced and seasoned leadership, the People's Army could demonstrate its might as an elite army strong in idea and faith and a matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu that is possessed of its own versatile war methods and experience of sure victories and equipped with Korean-style offensive and defensive means capable of fighting any form of modern warfare.
					
					 The cause of Juche-oriented army-building started on Mt. Paektu has been vigorously advanced by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The congratulatory speech made by him at a military parade in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the President's birth serves as a beacon and an immortal programme that indicated the way ahead of the army and people of the DPRK who are advancing along the road of independence, the road of Songun and the road of socialism. 
					
					 The revolution of Juche is sure to triumph thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un and the powerful revolutionary armed forces and single-minded unity of service persons and people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of the Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of the Sun
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Wednesday on the 80th anniversary of the founding of the KPA and paid noble tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 Accompanying him were leading officials of party, state and armed forces institutions Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Ro Tu Chol, Jo Yon Jun, members of the WPK Central Committee guidance body in Pyongyang as well as officials of party, Cabinet and social organizations, chief secretaries of district (county) committees of the WPK in Pyongyang and KPA men and officers.
					
					 Seen before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the NDC, Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where there are the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with the leading officials of party, state and armed forces institutions paid tribute to the portraits in humble reverence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the State Merited Chorus at the April 25 House of Culture here on the 80th anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, enjoyed the performance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Appears at Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Appears at Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop built on the bank of picturesque Pothong River in Pyongyang started its business on Wednesday.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people, appeared at the shop to congratulate its opening.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Tanzanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Tanzanian President
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Wednesday sent a message of greeting to President of Tanzania Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete on the 48th founding anniversary of the United Republic of Tanzania. 
					 The government and people of Tanzania gained big achievements in consolidating the independence of the country and achieving its national unity and economic development, Kim said in the message, wishing the president and the people of Tanzania greater success in the efforts for development and prosperity.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Visits Kim Hyong Jik Univ. under Renovation
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Visits Kim Hyong Jik Univ. under Renovation
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, learned about the work at Kim Hyong Jik University of Education under renovation on the spot on Tuesday.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il assigned the People's Army the task to successfully renovate the university as required by the new century and settled all issues arising in the project.
					
					 The soldier-builders dynamically pushed forward the project despite unfavorable weather conditions in severe winter.
					
					 Choe looked round for hours the interior and exterior of building No. 1 nearing completion and encouraged them to achieve achievements in the project so as to complete the project as quickly as possible at the best level as intended by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He underscored the need to thoroughly ensure the quality in the project in the spirit of working for their own parents and brothers and sisters and sprucing up the yards of their own houses under the motto "Let's help the people!" put up by Kim Jong Il.
					
					It is the way of upholding the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to creditably discharge the honorable mission of the People's Army as defender of the country and creator of the people's happiness, Choe said, calling upon them to renovate the seat for training educational talents in an impeccable manner and make a report on their victory to the supreme commander.

articles.title: Gifts from Foreigners
articles.content:
Gifts from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from foreigners.
					 They included a calligrapher's couple of State Council of China, the board director of a foodstuff company in Tangshan City of Hebei Province, China, the former Minister of Defence of Soviet Union and the chairperson of commemorative committee for Soviet Marshal G. K. Zhukov and the Manufacturer's Federation of Singapore.
					
					 The gifts were handed over to officials of the DPRK missions in the relevant countries and a DPRK official working in Qatar between April 12 and 14.

articles.title: Congratulations from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulations from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Wednesday, the 80th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The 80 year-long history covered by the KPA is brilliantly shining as annals of victory and glory in which it achieved the national independence, honorably defended the sovereignty of the country and strikingly demonstrated the might of Songun Korea and the dignity of the nation before the world despite all storms of history under the leadership of the commanders of Mt. Paektu, the message said.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il trained the KPA into a-match-for-a hundred strong revolutionary army, put all the people under arms, turned the whole country into a fortress and thus set a model of national defence for self-reliance, it noted.
					
					 It praised Kim Jong Un for greatly contributing to strengthening the political and military might of the KPA and increasing the defence capabilities for self-reliance, while accompanying Kim Jong Il in his journey of Songun from long ago.
					
					 We will wage a more dynamic struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration, the landmark of national reunification, and the October 4 declaration, the programme for its implementation, to bring the second June 15 era of reunification without fail and more fiercely kindle in the land of south the flames of the nationwide sacred war to bury traitors forever, in keeping with the spirit of all the service personnel and people in the north to punish them, it said.
					
					 The AINDF will always stand in the road of nationwide grand march toward the final victory, it concluded.

articles.title: Unhashu Concert Given
articles.content:
Unhashu Concert Given
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Unhasu concert "Let Us Not Forget the Pledge Made to the Revolution" was given with splendor at the People's Theater on Wednesday to celebrate the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Enjoying the concert were officials of armed forces organs and service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people in the city and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Colorful numbers were put on the state that started with the Patriotic Song.
					
					 The performers praised immortal feats of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who regarded the idea of attaching importance to the army as the basic factor of the revolution, founded the first Juche-type armed forces and exalted the glorious history of the Korean revolution that has advanced by dint of arms and emerged victorious based on comradeship. 
					
					 Female solo and pangchang "Song of Love for People" and female solo "The Leader Came Here with Loving Care" gave deep impressions to the audience as they portrayed the people's happiness that has been brought into full bloom thanks to the persevering efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They also sang of how the tradition of unity provided by the great persons of Mt. Paektu covering the arduous road of Songun revolution has been succeeded as history of great comradeship under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance reached its climax as choruses "Forward Korea" and "Song of General Kim Il Sung", an immortal revolutionary hymn, resounded throughout the concert hall, reflecting the oath of the army and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The concert was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the 80th anniversary of the KPA.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					  Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Laid before them were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions of science, education, literature and arts, public health, media, factories and enterprises, farms and schools as well as flowers.
					
					 Service persons, people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the equestrian statues of the President and Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio and made bows.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before statues of the President in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statues of martyrs, the monuments to fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army, martyr's cemeteries and graves across the country on Wednesday on the 80th anniversary of the KPA. 
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					 Wreaths were laid in the name of local party and power bodies, working people's organizations, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, industrial establishments, farms, schools, etc. Flowers were also laid before statues of martyrs, martyrs' cemeteries, the monuments to fallen fighters of the KPA and martyrs' graves.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the martyrs who laid down their lives for the liberation and prosperity of the country and the sacred cause for achieving the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Feats for Army Building
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Feats for Army Building
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- On the army day, the servicepersons and civilians of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea pay deep respects to Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, who is bringing a new heyday in the history of the revolutionary armed forces.
					 Kim Jong Un performed undying feats for building up the Juche-based armed forces, always accompanying leader Kim Jong Il on the road of the Songun (military-first) revolution and acting his closest military aide.
					
					 He guided the armed forces to give full play to the politico-ideological might as the army of the leader and the party and developed the Juche-based military idea, theory and war methods on an overall way.
					
					 He made a signal contribution to turning the Korean People's Army into an elite army equipped with self-defensive nuclear deterrent and up-to-date military hardware.
					
					 With superb commanding art, matchless courage and toughest countermeasure, he has neutralized the enemies' military provocations and war moves.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, the KPA could create the Huichon Speed, a new Chollima Speed, and work epoch-making miracles in the drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 After assuming the supreme commandership, he chose the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA as the first stop in his field guidance. Regarding soldiers as his closest comrades-in-arms, he made inspection tours of frontline military posts and remote islets, caring so much for them. 
					
					 Therefore, the men and officers of the KPA have regarded him as the dignity and destiny of the KPA, with firm faith that led by him they would always emerge victorious.
					
					 All servicepersons are now filled with resolve to devotedly defend him under the slogan "Let Us Defend with Our Very Lives the Party Central Committee Headed by the Great Comrade Kim Jong Un!" and fully discharge their mission in the struggle for national reunification and accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: DPRK Newspapers Mark KPA Anniversary
articles.content:
DPRK Newspapers Mark KPA Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers in the DPRK Wednesday dedicate editorials to the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army. The papers paid the highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, founder, builder and ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolutionary armed forces, and extended warm congratulations and militant greetings to the service persons of the Korean People's Army who have honorably defended the sky, land and seas of the country.  
					 The glorious 100 years of history of Juche Korea is being glorified thanks to the 80 year-long history of the KPA, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary traditions of Paektu, the lifeblood of the Korean revolution, were provided by the army and the indomitable mental power the core of which is the spirit of devotedly defending the leader was also created by the KPA. The precious gains of Korean-style socialism were also achieved thanks to the pioneer role of the army.
					
					 The 80 years of history covered by the Korean revolutionary armed forces teaches the iron truth that when the issue of the succession to leadership is successfully solved in army building, it will guarantee the emergence of the invincible forces.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the legendary brilliant commander who founded the original Songun idea, ushered in a new history of building the Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces and defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was an outstanding military genius who strengthened the KPA into the army of the leader, the party and the people under the banner of modeling the entire army on the Juche idea and put the DPRK on the position of world-level military power.
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is a distinguished brilliant commander of Songun who is possessed of the Juche-oriented military idea and tactics, matchless grit and will, adroit and consummate art of command and noble virtue at a highest stage.
					
					 As the great brilliant commander of Songun is being held at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces, the bright future is being opened up before the country and the nation and the might of the KPA has been cemented.
					
					 Minju Joson says that victory and glory are in store for the heroic KPA holding the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in high esteem.

articles.title: Hall of Wax Replica of Kim Jong Suk Opens
articles.content:
Hall of Wax Replica of Kim Jong Suk Opens
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A hall where stands a wax replica of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk was opened at the International Friendship Exhibition House of the DPRK.
					 Standing in the hall is a wax replica depicting woman commander of anti-Japanese guerillas Kim Jong Suk in uniform of the anti-Japanese guerrilla army on the table land full of azaleas in full bloom against the background of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The gifts she received from personages and people of various countries are on display there.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others.
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the Chinese embassy here and the chief of the hall of wax replicas of great persons in China and his party.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok expressed deep thanks to personages of the Chinese hall for representing the wax replica of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 He said the noble life of Kim Jong Suk was the most brilliant one of an outstanding woman revolutionary.
					
					 Zhang Molei, chief of the hall, in his speech bitterly grieved over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il, saying it was their wish to successfully represent the wax replica of Kim Jong Suk so they could please leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Expressing the will to do more things to contribute to the building of thriving socialist nation in the DPRK, he expressed belief that the Korean people would overcome difficulties and win great victory under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to Kim Jong Suk and looked round the gifts on display.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Chinese People's Association for Peace and Disarmament led by its Vice-President Li Wuwei, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, visited Mangyongdae on Tuesday.
					 Members of the delegation laid bouquets before the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae in humble reverence.
					
					 They looked round the historic relics preserved there, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of the President and his family members.
					
					 They posed for a picture in honor of their visit and toured revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The head of the delegation wrote in the visitors' book that the President's great cause and exploits will remain long in history.
					
					 The delegation also visited the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Co-op Farm, Taean Friendship Glass Factory, etc. and enjoyed a grand performance "Glory to Service Personnel of the Heroic Korean People's Army!" in celebration of the 80th anniversary of the KPA.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Statues
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Statues
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association led by Chairman Mamoru Kitahara Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Servicepersons Vow Loyalty to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Servicepersons Vow Loyalty to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- All servicepersons in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have hardened their resolution to ensure the cause of socialism with arms, upon receiving the dear respected Kim Jong Un's celebrated work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche".
					 Choe Chun Gil, a general officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 "In his work, Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un stressed the need to hold fast to the Songun-based revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea and bolster the military might of the country in every way.
					
					 A country with weak military might can not defend its sovereignty and right to existence but will become plaything and fall victim to the imperialists in the long run. This is the bitter lesson the Korean nation drew from its past history.
					
					 As Kim Jong Un taught we will strictly establish the system of the Party's leadership over the army, the supreme commander's guidance system and the revolutionary military discipline throughout the army so as to further strengthen the KPA into the army of the party and the leader."
					
					 Hyon Ki Chong, an officer of KPA, said:
					
					 "The work carries the noble intention of the supreme commander, who wants the KPA to display its honor of being standard-bearers of the Songun revolution in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 We will intensify our unit's military training to increase its combat capability in every way this significant year making the 80th birthday of the KPA.
					
					 All servicepersons of our unit are determined to prepare themselves to be a-match-for-a-hundred stalwart fighters, possessed of strong mentality, indomitable fighting spirit, and high combat ability and quality.
					
					 If the enemies invade sky, ground and sea of the DPRK even an inch, we will wipe out them at one stroke and acclaim the supreme commander at the square of national reunification."

articles.title: Servicepersons Wait for Order of Action
articles.content:
Servicepersons Wait for Order of Action
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The special operation action group of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army on Monday issued a notice that the special actions by the armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea would start soon to meet the reckless challenge of south Korea's Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 Upon hearing the notice, the servicepersons of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces are intensifying their combat training, with the strong will to wipe out the group of traitors.
					
					 Shouting such slogan as "Cut to pieces the Lee Myung Bak swarm of rats to the last one", they in the training fired machine-guns and automatic rifles at targets portraying the Lee swarm of rats.
					
					 A general officer, Kim Chang Il, told KCNA:
					
					 "I feel relieved to hear the notice. It represented our unanimous will to take revenge upon the provocateurs.
					
					 The special action group will knock down and blow up rat-like Myung Bak and his swarm of rats and their den in a flash.
					
					 The group of rats will terribly shudder at the might of the invincible armed forces trained under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu."
					
					 An officer, Kim Myong Chol, said:
					
					 "The time has come when we should show in actuality the might of our armed forces to the Lee Myung Bak swarm of rats hell-bent on hideous wrongdoings.
					
					 I am eager to join in the special action group to cut off the head of rattish Myung Bak. 
					
					 My capability only is enough to bury those disgusting rats into the South Sea once a sacred war starts.
					
					 Supreme Commander, please give us an order!"
					
					 An officer, Kim Myong Il, said:
					
					 "I am relieved to see this riddled image of disgusting rat-like Myung Bak who behaves like a puppy knowing no fear of tiger.
					
					 We are determined to wipe out the Lee swarm of rats to the last one and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, the long-cherished desire of all the Korean people."

articles.title: Servicepersons Take Lion's Share in Construction
articles.content:
Servicepersons Take Lion's Share in Construction
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The projects of the Huichon Power Station and the People's Theatre were finished in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, delighting the local people.
					 They are monumental edifices built by the soldier-builders, who carry out whatever it is, if it is the decision of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 "Let Us Undertake Both National Defence and Socialist Construction!" -- this is the slogan that the servicepersons have held high.
					
					 In the 1990s, they built the Anbyon Youth Power Station by displaying the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 Modernly-equipped essential foodstuff factories and chicken, pig and catfish farms and other stockbreeding bases took their shapes across the country by the efforts of the servicepersons. Also, Okryu and Chongnyu restaurants, Taedongmun Cinema, Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and State Theatre were fashionably face-lifted by them.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il considered the servicepersons to be a driving force in building a thriving nation and called on them to make a breakthrough on all fronts of socialist construction.
					
					 Now the servicepersons are pressing ahead with construction of 100,000 housing units in Pyongyang, the construction of Pyongyang Folklore Park and many other projects.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Represents Strong Sense of Moral Obligation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Represents Strong Sense of Moral Obligation
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un published his famous work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche". 
					 His work has evoked big responses from the people across the country.
					
					 Kim Chang Hwan, a department head of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 "The dear respected Kim Jong Un, who has a strong sense of moral obligation to leader Kim Jong Il, is creditably leading the Korean revolution to victory, true to his behests.
					
					 The work fully reflects his will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with Kim Jong Il held in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea forever and with his ideas and lines as eternal guidelines.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is an ever-victorious banner as well as a symbol of the Juche-based revolution. 
					
					 The work calls for bringing up a host of able scientists and technicians, who would be responsible for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 We will do our utmost to train the students to be frontrunners in pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology, bearing deep in mind Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on posterity." 
					
					 Song Yun Hui, chairwoman of the Management Board of the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, said:
					
					 "The work underscores the need to regard Kim Jong Il's behests as important guidelines and thoroughly implement them without slightest vacillation, thereby creditably translating into brilliant reality his plans and desire.
					
					 To fully settle the food problem was a lifelong desire of Kim Jong Il, and it is also the steadfast will of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 We will increase per-hectare grain output by applying latest farming science and technology in line with the Party's policy on agriculture."

articles.title: Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Accused: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Accused: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Japan said in "blue paper on diplomacy" for 2012 that the government is consistent in its stand that the Tok Islets are "part of Japan's inviolable territory" allegedly basing itself on "historical facts" and "international law".
					 A bylined commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says it reveals the criminal intentions to convince the world that the islets are "territory of Japan".
					
					 The Tok Islets are clearly indicated as part of the inalienable territory of Korea on old maps of Japan, says the commentary, adding:
					
					 The "New world map", the 16th section of complete book "Map of Japan" made by Japanese in 1892 was recently opened to public.
					
					 On that map the territory of Japan was colored yellow but the Ullung and Tok islets were marked colorless. 
					
					 On the "map of prefectures of Japan"(1895), the locations, streets and other objects under the jurisdiction of Shimane Prefecture were correctly mapped but the Tok Islets were not included.
					
					 Japan's territorial claim to the islets has neither legal ground nor validity.
					
					 Japan intends to convince the international community and the Japanese people that the Tok islets belong to Japan and make reinvasion after sparking off debates over the issue in a bid to realize its old dream of the "greater East Asia co-prosperity sphere".
					
					 From their misunderstanding of the Korean nation, the militarist forces of Japan have sought foolish attempts to realize their sinister intentions.
					
					 Japan should behave with discretion, aware that it is impossible for it to grab the islets.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Will Meet Miserable End: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Will Meet Miserable End: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Rat-like Lee Myung Bak on April 19 foolishly called for an "attack on the supreme headquarters through the office window", while bluffing that south Korea's missiles can instantly hit any part of the DPRK.
					 That day the military warmongers made public what they called new-type missiles and fired rocket shells into the forefront area less than 10 km away from the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 The reckless war-like act of Lee Myung Bak group is a foolish suicidal act of a newborn puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes this in a bylined commentary. 
					
					 The group of rats including Lee runs reckless escalating showdown with the DPRK. This is nothing but the last ditch efforts of the rats before death, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are waiting for an order for a sacred war of retaliation.
					
					 The special operation action group of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army issued a notice that the special actions of our revolutionary armed forces will start soon to meet the reckless challenge of the group of traitors.
					
					 It really meant it when it said it would reduce the group of rats and bases of provocation to ashes in a flash by unprecedented peculiar means and methods of our own style.
					
					 The world is about to witness the miserable end of the group of rat-like Lee.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Celebrate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place on April 15, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung at Sumida, Tokyo Prefecture, chapter office of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The officials of the office and compatriots attended the events.
					
					 They laid a floral basket before the portrait of the President.
					
					 Ri Myong Gwang, chairman of the office, made a remark in a lecture.
					
					 Korea, once a colony and weak country, turned into a political, ideological and military power no one dare provoke and the Koreans in Japan have become dignified overseas citizens of the DPRK thanks to the President, he said.
					
					 He called for repaying the benefaction of the President by laying a springboard for opening a new heyday of Chongryon.
					
					 O Kyu Sang, deputy chief of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, gave a lecture titled "President   Kim Il Sung was a kind-hearted father of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan."
					
					 A video "President and Koreans in Japan" was on show to be followed by a remembrance meeting.
					
					 A festival of compatriots in Shizuoka Prefecture for celebrating the centenary of the birth of the President was held at Korean primary and middle school in Shizuoka on the same day.
					
					 A speech made by Ri Myong Yu, chairman of the prefectural headquarters of Chongryon, was followed by an art performance.
					
					 There was a flower viewing gathering at 5th Korean primary and middle school in Tokyo on April 8.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Slammed for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Leader: Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Slammed for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Leader: Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "Let us wipe out Lee Myung Bak group of traitors from the stage of history by the concerted efforts of the whole nation".
					 At a time when celebrations took place in the motherland on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the Lee group let loose a spate of vituperation, kicking off an anti-DPRK campaign without hesitation, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Traitor Lee was so imprudent as to speak ill of the celebrations of the Day of the Sun in an internet and radio speech on April 16. Not content with this, the traitor took issue with the slogan "Let Us Live Our Own Way!"
					
					 This is the last ditch efforts of those who were shocked by the might of the single-minded unity of the DPRK and enormous military potentials demonstrated through the celebrations of the Day of the Sun and the desperate bid to quiet the cheering storms sweeping the world.
					
					 The officials of the Association and all the Koreans in China would work hard to wipe out the Lee group from the stage of the history together with all the compatriots aspiring after the country's reunification.
					
					 The Federation of Koreans in Australia issued a statement titled "We denounce the Lee Myung Bak 'government' for its vicious act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK" on April 21.
					
					 The responsibility of the prevailing serious situation entirely rests with Lee, the statement said, urging the Lee "government" to opt to retract the confrontation-minded measures at an early date and realize contact and exchange with the north.
					
					 Cooperation between the north and the south is the only shortcut to the country's reunification, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported at 15th Congress of WIDF
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported at 15th Congress of WIDF
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The 15th Congress of the Women's International Democratic Federation expressed support and solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people. It was held in Brazil from April 8 to 12.
					 Marcia de Campos Pereira, president of the federation, in a report at the opening ceremony of the congress, said that the DPRK is a signpost of those countries advancing toward independence against imperialism as it is firmly defending its sovereignty despite the moves of the imperialists to invade and stifle it.
					
					 She extended support and encouragement to the Korean women and other people in their struggle to shatter all the provocations of the imperialists.
					
					 Speakers denounced the United States for throwing hurdles in the way of the Korean people for the peaceful reunification of the country while constantly keeping its aggression troops in south Korea.
					
					 The final declaration adopted at the congress underlined the need to organize the solidarity committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation for supporting the cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The congress adopted a solidarity statement for supporting the cause of the Korean people titled "The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean Lee Myung Bak group, stop at once threat and blackmail against the DPRK and ensure peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula".
					
					 The Women's International Democratic Federation in a statement said that it together with world progressive mankind positively supports the policy of the DPRK and the efforts of its scientists to develop and use space for the building of an independent state.
					
					 The congress adopted a letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There was a march for solidarity with the world women for peace. The participants shouted slogans supporting the cause of the Korean people who are dynamically advancing the socialist cause under the uplifted banner of Songun and the banner of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Letter from WIDF
articles.content:
Letter from WIDF
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the 15th congress of the Women's International Democratic Federation on April 12.
					 The letter said that the congress of the Women's International Democratic Federation was significant as it was held during the commemoration period for the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The President was a great thinker and theoretician and an outstanding leader who founded the immortal Juche idea to indicate the way of the human cause of independence, paved the way for the Songun revolution and led the Korean revolution to victory, and an iron-willed brilliant commander who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 The letter continued:
					
					 Kim Il Sung enjoyed undisputed prestige in the world political circle and boundless reverence of mankind for his great contribution to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence. 
					
					 His undying revolutionary feats for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence will shine forever in history.
					
					 The Korean revolution pioneered by the President and led by Kim Jong Il to victory is being firmly carried forward thanks to the outstanding Songun leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The letter expressed the conviction that the Korean women and other people will register great achievements in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation as there is Kim Jong Un. The letter extended full support and firm solidarity to them.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Celebrated by WIDF
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Celebrated by WIDF
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in Brazil under the sponsorship of the Women's International Democratic Federation. They were to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and congratulate the Koreans on holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea forever and electing Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the WPK and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK.
					 A meeting, seminar, book, photo and handicraft exhibition and film show were held between April 8 and 12.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos of their undying feats and books, photos and handicrafts introducing the true picture of the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included "Song to the Party", "Korea Says with Bitter Tears" and "Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang'".
					
					 Present at the celebrations were delegations and delegates of nearly 80 organizations of 60 countries to the 15th Congress of the Women's International Democratic Federation, Brazilian women, the DPRK ambassador to Brazil and staff members of his embassy and a delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Eternal Sun: Political Party, Organization of Brazil, Poland
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Eternal Sun: Political Party, Organization of Brazil, Poland
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on Internet websites of Brazil and Poland on the occasions of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on April 9 posted on its Internet website an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, eternal sun" with a photo of him acknowledging the cheering masses.
					
					 The article said that all those who met the President were fascinated by his noble traits, and his august name is shining in many countries of the world amid reverence of all people.
					
					 The President's shining career and undying feats will go down in human history as the sun is eternal, the article noted.
					
					 The Polish Communist Party on April 10 posted on its Internet website an article titled "Let us know well about the DPRK".
					
					 The Korean people are celebrating the centenary of the birth of the President, the founder of the DPRK, the article said, underlining the need to know better about the DPRK and positively support the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 Polish Internet website "The DPRK" on April 8 edited articles titled "Kim Il Sung, shining august name", "Kim Il Sung, holding high banner of independence" and "Songun politics and Korean Peninsula".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Political Figures of France, Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Political Figures of France, Uganda
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Political figures of France and Uganda praised the feats of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The international secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League published the following article in the April issue of the organ of the league:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth the Juche-based line that the Korean people should wage the armed struggle against Japanese imperialism by their own efforts and achieve the independence of the country, founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in April 1932 and liberated Korea in August 1945.
					
					 The President laid out correct line and policies at each stage of the revolution and construction and conducted energetic activities till the last moments of his life for the reunification of Korea which was divided by foreign forces.
					
					 The French Revolutionary Communist League extends the noblest tribute to the President who made undying contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of independence against imperialism on the occasion of the centenary of his birth.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement said in a statement on April 15:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the distinguished leader who indicated the road for independence and prosperity of mankind with his undying Juche idea.
					
					 He was the founder of socialist Korea who liberated it and turned it into a rich and powerful nation. So, the Korean people and the world progressives are boundlessly revering him.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of mankind.

articles.title: Bulletins Issued in Guinea, Cambodia
articles.content:
Bulletins Issued in Guinea, Cambodia
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Bulletins were issued in Guinea and Cambodia to celebrate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Guinean Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Centenary of the Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint special bulletin on April 3 edited an article titled "Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The President hewed out a new path of the Korean revolution, organized the armed struggle against Japanese imperialism to achieve the historic cause of Korea's liberation, founded the DPRK and turned it into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, the bulletin said.
					
					 He had distinguished prestige in the world political circle and enjoyed boundless reverence of the progressives for his great feats for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence, it noted.
					
					 He set forth the plan on global independence, led the world people advocating independence to get firmly united to struggle against imperialism and dominationism and greatly contributed to strengthening the socialist movement and the non-aligned movement, it pointed out.
					
					 AKP of Cambodia in a bulletin on April 10 carried an article on the President's undying revolutionary career and feats.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Five-Point Policy For National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by the Cedi Publishing House in Democratic Congo.
					 The work, published on June 25, 1973, indicates the content of the five-point policy for national reunification and the significance and validity of its publication.
					
					 The content of the five-point policy for national reunification is to remove military stand-off and the tensions between the north and the south.
					
					 The policy also calls for realizing multilateral cooperation and exchange and convening a grand national meeting represented by people from all walks of life and political parties and social organizations in the north and the south.
					
					 The establishment of the north-south federation with a single country name is also included in the policy.
					
					 The policy also calls on the north and south to ensure coordination in relations with foreign countries and enter the UN with one country name of the Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place in Kinshasa on April 13.

articles.title: Acto central por 80o aniversario de Fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Acto central por 80o aniversario de Fundacion del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar solemnemente el dia 25 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 80o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion participo Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del PTC y el pueblo coreano.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas, y el poder, organizaciones sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea (ESIPC), los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, familiares de los uniformados del EPC, trabajadores, coreanos en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista (FDNA).
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					Primero, el informante felicito calurosamente a los oficiales y soldados del EPC y del ESIPC y los miembros del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y la Guardia Juvenil Roja y rindio sublime homenaje a los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses y los del EPC quienes dedicaron sus preciosas vidas por la libertad y la independencia de la patria y la liberacion del pueblo.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 25 de abril de 1932 el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea con que cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria derrotando a los agresores imperialistas japoneses, comenzo Ri y continuo:
					
					Gracias a la destacada direccion del Songun del Presidente quien pese a la situacion tan compleja y dificil dada despues de liberacion de Corea, fortalecio el EPC como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares y fundo la industria de defensa nacional independiente, la RPDC pudo acelerar energicamente la construccion de una nueva patria teniendo la garantia militar.
					
					La victoria historica en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (junio de 1950-julio de 1953) fue la victoria de la autoctona idea militar, la ferrea voluntad y el diestro mando militar del Presidente y un milagro militar del siglo 20 que la joven RPDC hizo anicos el mito de la "supremacia" del imperialismo norteamericano en el mundo.
					
					Durante todo el curso de su direccion sobre la construccion del ejercito, el Presidente hizo al EPC mantener invariablemente el caracter de fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del partido, que heredan la tradicion de la lucha armada antijaponesa, y presento la linea militar de autodefensa y la consigna "Uno contra cien enemigos", de modo que se consolidara en todos los sentidos el poderio de defensa nacional.
					
					La causa de construccion del ejercito, iniciada y conducida por el Presidente, continuo firmemente gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado, el Dirigente formulo la politica de Songun como principal modo politico del socialismo y antepuso el EPC como grueso de la revolucion en el principio de que el ejercito es primero, la clase obrera despues.
					
					Merced a su probada y destacada direccion, el EPC se ha hecho un ejercito de flor y nata poderoso en la idea y conviccion y fuerzas armadas revolucionarias sin rivales del monte Paektu que tienen todas las tacticas autoctonas y experiencias para la victoria y disponen de los medios de ataque y defensa al estilo nuestro capaces de hacer frente a cualquier guerra moderna.
					
					Hoy dia, la causa de construccion del ejercito del Juche, iniciada en el monte Paektu, avanza sin cesar por el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un. 
					
					El discurso de felicitacion pronunciado por el en el desfile militar por el centenario del natalicio del Presidente constituye el faro y programa que ilumina el camino a seguir por el ejercito y el pueblo que avanzan por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo.
					
					Gracias a la destacada direccion de Kim Jong Un, las poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y la unidad monolitica entre el ejercito y el pueblo, es definitiva la victoria de la revolucion Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a    Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del octogesimo aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 25 el Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan y rindio homenaje postumo al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ceremonia de homenaje los cuadros directivos de las instituciones del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas: Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Ro Tu Chol, Jo Yon Jun, los miembros del organo directivo central del PTC en esta capital, los funcionarios del partido, el Consejo de Ministros y las entidades sociales, los secretarios responsables de los comites del PTC en los municipios (distritos) de la capital, los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					Estaba colocado al pie de las imagenes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el CDN de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente entro en el hall donde se encuentran las imagenes de esos grandes lideres sonrientes.
					
					Junto con los cuadros directivos de las instituciones del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, Kim Jong Un rindio sublime homenaje al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y al Generalisimo       Kim Jong Il ante sus imagenes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 80o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvo lugar con exito el dia 25 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					La presencio Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del PTC y el pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de reconstruccion de universidad
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de reconstruccion de universidad
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, analizo en el terreno el dia 24 la obra de reconstruccion de la Universidad Pedagogica       Kim Hyong Jik.
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dio al EPC la tarea de reconstruirla magnificamente de acuerdo con la demanda del nuevo siglo y resolvio todos los problemas pendientes. 
					
					Los constructores militares realizaron la obra sin hacer caso de las condiciones climaticas desfavorables de la estacion invernal. 
					
					Choe Ryong Hae recorrio el interior y el exterior del edificio no. 1 en la etapa final y estimulo a los constructores militares quienes alcanzan exitos laborales en la obra para terminarla cuanto antes en el maximo nivel.
					
					Insistio en la necesidad de asegurar la calidad de la obra con el alma de atender a sus propios familiares y arreglar sus propios hogares bajo la consigna "!Ayudemos al pueblo!" presentada por el Dirigente. 
					
					Para apoyar el noble proposito del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un los militares deben cumplir con su honrosa mision del ejercito popular como defensor de la patria y creador de la felicidad del pueblo, dijo y llamo a reconstruir excelentemente este plantel docente y dar el parte de triunfo al Comandante Supremo.

articles.title: Inaugurado salon de la estatua de cera de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Inaugurado salon de la estatua de cera de Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo acondicionado nuevamente en la Exposicion Permanente de Amistad Internacional el salon de la estatua de cera de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					En el salon hay la estatua de cera de esa generala en uniforme de la guerrilla antijaponesa parada en loma llena de azaleas y en su fondo se divisa el monte Paektu. 
					
					Ademas, estan exhibidos los regalos obsequiados a ella por las personalidades y habitantes de varios paises del mundo.
					
					Tuvo lugar la vispera la ceremonia de inauguracion.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y otros cuadros.
					
					Fueron invitados los miembros de la embajada china en Corea, el director del hall de las replicas de cera de los grandes hombres de China y su comitiva.
					
					En su discurso de apertura, Choe Thae Bok expreso agradecimiento a las personalidades del hall chino por haber hecho la estatua de cera de Kim Jong Suk.
					
					Prosiguio que la noble vida de ella fue la mas brillante de revolucionaria destacada.
					
					En su discurso, el director del hall Zhang Molei lamento mucho el fallecimiento del Dirigente      Kim Jong Il senalando que queria alegrarle al describir mejor la estatua de cera de Kim Jong Suk.
					
					En el futuro tambien, hare muchas cosas que contribuyan a la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista en Corea, destaco y manifesto su conviccion de que el pueblo coreano lograra grandes victorias superando todas las dificultades.
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje a            Kim Jong Suk ante su estatua y pasaron revista a los regalos exhibidos.
